ygData.subject: Re: How are people getting the white scales
ygData.msgSnippet: Mana Sieving Vox does help... all the tanks pushing her one direction can t hurt as well. :)  I ve only fought her once (and even then, I just watched thru
ygData.messageBody:
Mana Sieving Vox does help... all the tanks pushing her one direction
can't hurt as well. :) I've only fought her once (and even then, I
just watched thru Bind Sight, hehe), but I've read up on her lots.
My scale came off Vox and she went down the first attempt, but I
understand (and from what other Bards here posted) that's not the
norm. We had a great leader for our raid (I'm not talking about me,
hehe) and everyone thankfully listened and did their job (after
aggroing about 6 IG's at the beginning).

Bard Trak is identical in Level, Str, and Abilities as the normal
Trak, but he is not buffed by Jumpy, which makes him easier to kill.
He drops 1 Kunark BP and the Trak Guts. No other loot, not even
spells when we killed him.

Someone else asked about Phin still being a gimp... Phin can be
single pulled to the ledge by a Level 60, so he's just a little more
work (having to swim to his lair) than before the change... It's
probably faster to swim to him, pull him and swim/gate out than it
was to get the eye thing to work anyway. :)

Darkfox
Xegony



--- In eqbards@y..., Rebecca Small <rsmall@c...> wrote:
> As to keeping vox from Ch'ing, our theory is to have all the tanks
on the same side to cause her to move. The moving is supposed to
interrupt her spells. We've been susccessful with this the couple
times I was along.
> I have heard the spawned Trak is the same as the Real Trak in drops
and power, but I have not fought him personally.
